short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be Notified When Your Favorite Products Become Cheaper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be Kanjoos is a chrome extension that notifies you when your favorite products become cheaper. 

It makes it super easy to track products across Ebay, Target, Walmart, Flipkart and Bestbuy! Support for more websites coming soon!
